LanguageData.TheMultiverseMod_Description: The Multiverse Mod brings together races, factions, items, and lore from multiple beloved franchises into RimWorld. Featuring a custom alien race framework, advanced graphics support, and seamless integration, this mod delivers a unique cross-universe experience.
LanguageData.Apparel_OrderWatchArmor_Description: Distinctive blue and gold armor worn by members of the Order of the Watch, the temple guardians and peacekeepers.
LanguageData.Apparel_OrderWarArmor_Description: Heavy combat armor worn by the Order of War, the military wing of the Tribunal Temple.
LanguageData.Apparel_OrderDoctrineRobes_Description: Scholarly robes worn by members of the Order of Doctrine and Ordination.
LanguageData.Apparel_OrderInquisitionArmor_Descriptio: Dark, intimidating armor worn by members of the Order of Inquisition.
LanguageData.Apparel_HighOrdinatorArmor_Description: Magnificent golden armor worn by High Ordinators, the elite temple guards.
LanguageData.Apparel_HandsAlmalexiaArmor_Description: Legendary divine armor worn by the Hands of Almalexia.
LanguageData.Apparel_BuoyantArmigerArmor_Description: Distinctive armor worn by the Buoyant Armigers, elite warrior-mystics.
LanguageData.Apparel_AhemmusaRobes_Description: Traditional robes worn by members of the peaceful Ahemmusa clan.
LanguageData.Apparel_UrshilakuGarments_Description: Traditional clothing of the Urshilaku clan, keepers of ancient prophecies.
LanguageData.Apparel_ErabenimsunWarGarb_Description: Battle-ready clothing of the fierce Erabenimsun clan.
LanguageData.Apparel_ZainabTraderGarments_Description: Fine clothing worn by members of the Zainab clan, skilled traders and diplomats.
LanguageData.Apparel_KageshRitualRobes_Description: Mysterious dark robes worn by members of the Kagesh clan.
LanguageData.Apparel_UlathShadowGarments_Description: Specially designed clothing of the secretive Ulath clan.
LanguageData.Apparel_VereansuSpiritRobes_Description: Sacred robes worn by the Vereansu clan.
LanguageData.Apparel_MabrigashWarriorRobes_Descriptio: Mystical warrior robes worn by the matriarchal Mabrigash clan.
LanguageData.Apparel_BonemouldArmor_Description: Traditional Dunmer armor crafted from the hardened shells and bones of native creatures. This distinctive armor provides excellent protection while maintaining mobility.
LanguageData.Apparel_BonemouldArmor_GahJulan_Descript: Traditional bonemould armor crafted in the Gah-Julan style favored by House Redoran, featuring enhanced protection and distinctive styling.
LanguageData.Apparel_BonemouldArmor_ArmunanStyle_Desc: Traditional bonemould armor crafted in the Armun-an style favored by House Hlaalu, combining practical protection with elegant decorative elements.
LanguageData.Apparel_HouseRedoranMasterHelmet_Descrip: The unique ceremonial helmet worn by the leader of House Redoran.
LanguageData.Apparel_HouseTelvanniRobes_Description: Mystical robes worn by the sorcerers of House Telvanni.
LanguageData.Apparel_HouseIndorilArmor_Description: Sacred armor worn by House Indoril, the devout temple guardians.
LanguageData.Apparel_HouseDresGarments_Description: Practical garments worn by House Dres, the agrarian slaveholders.
LanguageData.Apparel_SleeperRobes_Description: Tattered robes worn by those afflicted with the Corpus disease.
LanguageData.Apparel_AshVampireArmor_Description: Corrupted armor worn by Ash Vampires, the elite servants of Dagoth Ur.
LanguageData.Apparel_CorpusStalkerGear_Description: Specialized equipment worn by Corpus Stalkers.
LanguageData.Apparel_CorprusBeastHide_Description: Rough hide taken from a corprus creature and fashioned into crude protective wear.
LanguageData.Meme_TribunalWorship_Description: Devotion to the Living Gods of Morrowind: Almalexia the Healing Mother, Sotha Sil the Clockwork God, and Vivec the Poet-Warrior, combined with veneration of noble ancestors and House founders. This faith teaches that these three former mortals achieved divinity through wisdom, struggle, and sacrifice, while also honoring the bloodlines and traditions of the Great Houses.
LanguageData.Meme_CorpusCult_Description: Veneration of Dagoth Ur and the divine disease known as Corpus. Followers believe that Corpus is not a curse but a blessing that transforms the faithful into something greater than mortal flesh. They seek to spread this "gift" and serve their god-king in his underground citadel.
LanguageData.Meme_AshlanderAncestorWorship_Descriptio: The ancient faith of the nomadic Ashlander tribes, venerating the spirits of deceased ancestors and the Good Daedra: Azura the Dusk and Dawn, Boethiah the Prince of Plots, and Mephala the Webspinner. This was the original Chimer religion, focusing on worship of the 4 good Daedra, with the other bad Daedra being of the House of Troubles.
LanguageData.Precept_TempleFaith_Required_Description: The faithful must venerate the Living Gods and follow Temple orthodoxy.
LanguageData.Precept_CorpusBlessing_Required_Descript: The faithful must embrace Corpus as a divine gift, not a curse.
LanguageData.Precept_AncestorWisdom_Required_Descript: The faithful must honor the ancestors and preserve ancient traditions.
LanguageData.Precept_HouseHonor_Required_Description: The faithful must uphold House honor and noble traditions.
LanguageData.Thought_TempleFaith_Satisfied_Descriptio: I have honored the Tribunal and followed Temple teachings.
LanguageData.Thought_TempleFaith_Violated_Description: I have failed the Tribunal and strayed from Temple orthodoxy.
LanguageData.Thought_CorpusBlessing_Satisfied_Descrip: I have embraced the divine gifts of Corpus transformation.
LanguageData.Thought_CorpusBlessing_Violated_Descript: I have spurned the Sharmat's gifts and denied my transformation.
LanguageData.Thought_AncestorWisdom_Satisfied_Descrip: I have followed ancient traditions and respected the wisdom of those who came before.
LanguageData.Thought_AncestorWisdom_Violated_Descript: I have forgotten the old ways and abandoned traditional wisdom.
LanguageData.Thought_HouseHonor_Satisfied_Description: I have maintained the dignity and traditions of my Great House.
LanguageData.Thought_HouseHonor_Violated_Description: I have brought dishonor upon my noble bloodline and ancestral legacy.
LanguageData.Sujamma_Description: A potent alcoholic beverage beloved by the Dunmer people. This strong drink is fermented from local ingredients and has a distinctive bitter taste that pairs well with traditional Dunmer cuisine.
LanguageData.Mazte_Description: A traditional Dunmer beer brewed from saltrice. This mildly alcoholic beverage has a grainy, slightly sweet flavor and is commonly consumed with meals.
LanguageData.Flin_Description: A potent alcoholic drink favored by Dunmer warriors and nobles. Flin has a sharp, fiery taste and is significantly stronger than mazte.
LanguageData.Greef_Description: A traditional Dunmer alcoholic beverage with a distinctive herbal flavor. Greef is brewed using various native plants and has mild intoxicating effects.
LanguageData.Shein_Description: An elegant wine-like beverage favored by Dunmer nobility and the upper classes. Shein has a complex, refined flavor and is often served during formal occasions.
